1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
8/20/2022: Signed a contract extension with Kansas City, $5,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Injured on 10/15/2022 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/2023, hitting .474 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Traded from Kansas City to Minnesota on 7/31/2024 (Going to MIN: CF Amalani Fukofuka. Going to KC: P Oliver Kimmell)...
10/28/2024: Signed a contract extension with Minnesota, $3,350,000 per year, for 2 years.
Had 5 hits with 8 RBI against Cleveland on 9/13/2025...
Signed as a free agent by Arizona on 2/1/2027 to a 3-year deal worth $3,783,500 per year...
